mapper.select: SELECT log_id,teacher_id,ip,operate_time,content,result,message FROM log_ ORDER BY operate_time DESC

SELECT log_id,teacher_id,ip,operate_time,content,result,message FROM log_
AND log_id=#{log.logId}
AND teacher_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{log.teacherId},'%')
AND ip LIKE CONCAT('%',#{log.ip},'%')
AND content LIKE CONCAT('%',{log.content},'%')
AND result LIKE CONCAT('%',#{log.result},'%')
ORDER BY operate_time DESC
